name: @discoveryjs/json-ext
description: A set of utilities that extend the use of JSON

scripts.test:all: npm run test:src && npm run test:dist
scripts.test:dist: cross-env MODE=dist npm test && cross-env MODE=dist-min npm test
scripts.build-and-test: npm run build && npm run test:dist
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run lint && npm test && npm run build-and-test
